option.t-att-selected: partner_category.id == ('City_westfield' in return_vals and return_vals['City_westfield'] and int(return_vals['City_westfield']) or 0)
'tstation' in return_vals and return_vals['tstation'] and int(return_vals['tstation'])==tstation.id

a.title: Click to search for restaurants around tube stations using the map view

select.name: Cuisine
select.title: Select Cuisine. Tour operators will be able to filter their search based on the cuisine

select.name: Dining
select.title: Select a Dining Style. Tour operators will be able to filter their search based on the dining style

option.t-att-selected: 'table_size' in return_vals and return_vals['table_size'] == '10 and under' or ''

input.name: fav_rest
input.title: Check this box if you want to view your list of Favourite Restaurants

input.name: kids_menu
input.title: Check this box if you want to view list of Restaurants having Kids Menus

input.name: markup_added
input.title: Check this box if you want to view list of Restaurants with your markup added

t.t-value: user.partner_id.wbsite_color or user.partner_id.parent_id and user.partner_id.parent_id.wbsite_color or ''

tr.t-att-style: partner.id in markup_thr and user.is_wlabeling and uid.role != 'client_cust' and 'border-left:5px solid ' + str(wcolor or '#793487') +';' or partner.id in markup_thr and uid.role != 'client_cust' and 'border-left:5px solid #793487;' or ''

i.t-attf-title: #{partner in user.fav_rest_ids and 'Remove from Favourites' or 'Add to Favourites'}
i.t-attf-class: empty_star fa #{partner in user.fav_rest_ids and 'fa-star' or 'fa-star-o'} main_color

i.title: Uncheck to hide restaurant
i.t-attf-class: empty_checkbox fa #{partner in operator.contact_ids and 'fa-square-o' or 'fa-check-square-o'} main_color

t.t-if: not user.is_group and from_which != 'events' and grp_size.get(partner.id)

t.t-value: from_which == 'events' and event and event.id or partner.id
from_which == 'events' and event and event.id or partner.id

t.t-if: not user.is_group and from_which != 'events' and grp_size.get(partner.id)
